abstract: Disney is capitalizing on Swampy, the alligator from the popular Where’s My Water? game, introducing merchandise at Toys ‘R’ Us and featuring the character in a Web series.
snippet: Disney is capitalizing on Swampy, the alligator from the popular Where’s My Water? game, introducing merchandise at Toys ‘R’ Us and featuring the character in a Web series.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Will Swampy sink or swim in the Disney big leagues?

headline.main: Will Disney’s Swampy Gator Be the Next Angry Birds?
